subject: Allow libpinyin to build in cross compile mode.
commitMessage:
Allow libpinyin to build in cross compile mode.

 - Yocto needs cross compile support.
 - Clean specfile.
 - Regenerate the configure file.
 - Remove generate files.
 - use rpm macro (allow yocto to add var to make command).
 - Improve rpmlint score.

[kevin.thierry: Add missing dependency on pkgconfig.]

Change-Id: If73d1592b15a6296c6eb2110811c98cc54f44e84
Signed-off-by: Ronan Le Martret <ronan@fridu.net>
Signed-off-by: Kévin THIERRY <kevin.thierry@open.eurogiciel.org>

The SR (Submit Request) has been accepted to OBS Tizen:IVI project.
- Package: xmlsec1
- Reviewer: tizenrobot
- Comments: SR 29369 is set to accepted state. Your submission has been accepted into Tizen IVI project.
-
After rebuild your package(s) will end up in the latest IVI snapshot repositories:
i586 atom repository: https://download.tizen.org/snapshots/tizen/ivi/ivi/latest/repos/ivi/
i586 emulator repository: https://download.tizen.org/snapshots/tizen/ivi/ivi/latest/repos/emul/
-
You can find latest snapshot images in the latest IVI snapshot repository:
i586 EFI image: https://download.tizen.org/snapshots/tizen/ivi/ivi/latest/images/ivi-efi-i586/
i586 MBR image: https://download.tizen.org/snapshots/tizen/ivi/ivi/latest/images/ivi-mbr-i586/
i586 MBR emulator image: https://download.tizen.org/snapshots/tizen/ivi/ivi/latest/images/ivi-mbr-i586-emul/
-
Your package(s) will be included into the next daily release.
- Git project: platform/upstream/libpinyin
- Tag:submit/tizen_ivi/20141007.444444
- Request URL:https://build.tizen.org/request/show/29369

Patch Set 4:

A SR (Submit Request) has been triggered to submit the commit to OBS Tizen:Mobile project.
- Submitter: Eduardo Lima (Etrunko) <eduardo.lima@intel.com>
- Comments: This package is a dependency for the ibus-libpinyin package, which is the
engine that takes care of Chinese input method. It connects to IBus and will be
used indirectly by weekeyboard.
- Git project: platform/upstream/libpinyin
- Tag: submit/tizen/20131219.192602
